name: The tower (itch) (fatnoob)
description:
Sako and Izuki finds a very tall and mysterious tower and goes in and finds out what's in it. It turns out to be a game that forces you to kill strong aliens from outside. The players will die if they don't survive from the strong aliens and there's no escaping the tower until the players finish all 5 levels. Sako and his party tries to find out who created this hell and why.

I'll have to throw this shitty game off and make it a video on YouTube for the worst rpg maker game ever
